  "\u221e",
  "\ufffd",

  "",
  "",
  ""
 }

        gregorian{
            AmPmMarkers{
          "AM",
          "PM"
            }
            DateTimeElements:intvector{
          1,
          
            }
            DateTimePatterns{
          "",
          "",
          "hh:mm:ss a",
          "",
          "dd MMMM yyyy",
          "",
          "",
          "yyyy/MM/dd",
          "",
            }
            dayNames{
                format{
                    abbreviated{
                  "Sun",
                  "Mon",
                  "Tue",
                  "Wed",
                  "Thu",
                  "Fri",
                  "Sat"
                    }
                    wide{
                  "Sunday",

                  "Tuesday",

                  "Thursday",

                  "Saturday"
                    }
                }
            }

                format{
